fixes.name: Años de estudio
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    NOT(ISBLANK('historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Año título])),
    'historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Año título] - 'historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Año inicio],
    IF(
        NOT(ISBLANK('historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Año inicio])),
        'historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Año título] - 'historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Año inicio],
        BLANK()
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau ISNULL checks to DAX ISBLANK and preserved the conditional logic as nested IF statements. References were transformed to 'TableName'[ColumnName] format. This is a row-level calculation using only row fields, so it is implemented as a calculated column.
